title: Drawing, "Censer and Incense Holder"
medium:
Pen and black ink, yellow, brown wash, graphite
Support: light blue laid paper
markings: Marks: [V]ANDER LEY wtih Strasburg bend and lily, bending sinister, similar to Churchill 433
